lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
It is a hot summer night and the guys are drinking beer in the park down the street. One of them suggests a beer guzzling contest. They want to know if you want to be, "one of the boys."
The contest is to see who can drink a 32-ounce bottle of beer the fastest without stopping. All of the losers must drink an additional 32-ounce bottle of beer.
You are one of the losers.
You drink the second bottle of beer and promptly pass out.
